name: obision-extension-one-win
description: Obision One Win - A GNOME Shell extension for one window work

scripts.build: npm run compile-schemas && npm run pack
scripts.deploy:
npm run build && npm run install && echo '
✓ Extension installed! Restart GNOME Shell:' && echo '  X11: Alt+F2 → type r → Enter' && echo '  Wayland: Log out and back in' && echo '
Then run: npm run enable'
scripts.update: npm run build && npm run install && npm run reload
scripts.deb-build: dpkg-buildpackage -us -uc -b && mkdir -p builddir && mv ../gnome-shell-extension-obision-one-win_*.deb builddir/obision-extension-one-win.deb && mv ../gnome-shell-extension-obision-one-win_*.buildinfo builddir/ 2>/dev/null || true && mv ../gnome-shell-extension-obision-one-win_*.changes builddir/ 2>/dev/null || true
scripts.deb-install: sudo dpkg -i builddir/obision-extension-one-win.deb && sudo apt-get install -f

author: Jose Francisco Gonzalez <jfgs1609@gmail.com>
